trans-unit.source: Verifies a Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) PKCS#1 v1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: Verifica uma assinatura PKCS#1 v1.5 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital) que contém a chave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter" /> com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo de hash a ser usado para o desformatador de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o algoritmo de hash para o desformatador de assinatura <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="strName" /> parameter does not map to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="strName" /> não é mapeado para o algoritmo de hash <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este método não é usado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> algorithm requires the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> algoritmo exige o <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> algoritmo de hash.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> que contém a chave.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key to be used for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a chave a ser usada para o desformatador de assinatura <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The data signed with <c>rgbSignature</c>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados assinados com <c>rgbSignature</c>.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for <c>rgbHash</c>.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura a ser verificada para <c>rgbHash</c>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature on the data.
trans-unit.target: Verifica a assinatura <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital) nos dados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid for the data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a assinatura for válida para os dados; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbSignature" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The DSA key is missing.
trans-unit.target: A chave DSA está ausente.
